summary: Iteration 9: Comprehensive testing of Live Activity Tracking feature. All 18 backend API tests passed. All frontend features working correctly including Start Live Activity dialog, activity selection, live tracking page with timer/stats, and Start/Pause/Resume/Stop controls.

issues: GPS error shown in console when geolocation not available (expected behavior in test environment)

passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/start - Creates new session for running, walking, yoga, cycling activities
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/start - Validates activity type (rejects invalid types)
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/start - Accepts target goals (duration, distance, calories)
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/update - Updates session stats (duration, distance, calories, steps)
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/update - Accepts GPS points
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/update - Returns 404 for invalid session
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/end - Saves activity to history with correct data
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/end - Saves GPS route data
Backend: POST /api/fitness/live/end - Returns 404 for invalid session
Backend: GET /api/fitness/live/active - Returns active session
Backend: GET /api/fitness/live/active - Returns null when no active session
Backend: DELETE /api/fitness/live/{session_id} - Cancels/discards session
Backend: GET /api/fitness/live/history - Returns live tracked activities
Backend: GET /api/fitness/activity-types - Returns all activity types with MET values
Frontend: Start Live Activity button on KaizerFit page opens dialog
Frontend: Activity selection dialog shows 9 activity types
Frontend: Selecting activity and clicking Start Tracking navigates to /live-activity/:type
Frontend: Live Activity page displays timer, distance, calories, steps stats
Frontend: Start button starts activity (calls /api/fitness/live/start)
Frontend: Timer increments correctly
Frontend: Pause button pauses the activity
Frontend: Resume button resumes the activity
Frontend: Stop button saves activity (calls /api/fitness/live/end) and redirects to /fitness
Frontend: Success toast shown in Telugu after activity saved
critical_code_review_comments: Live Activity API well implemented with proper session management
GPS tracking implemented for applicable activities (running, walking, cycling, hiking, football)
Added data-testid attributes to Start/Pause/Resume/Stop buttons for better testability
Activity history correctly filters by source='live_tracking'
seed_data_creation: Created multiple live activity sessions during testing (running, walking, cycling)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Live Activity Tracking feature fully tested and working. Backend APIs: /api/fitness/live/start, /update, /end, /active, DELETE /{session_id}, /history all working. Frontend: KaizerFit page has 'Start Live Activity' button that opens dialog with 9 activity types. Selecting activity navigates to /live-activity/:type page with timer, stats (distance, calories, steps, heart rate), and Start/Pause/Resume/Stop controls. GPS tracking works for applicable activities. Activities saved with source='live_tracking'.

live_activity_frontend.details: Start Live Activity button opens dialog with 9 activity types. Selecting activity navigates to /live-activity/:type. Page shows timer, distance, calories, steps, heart rate. Start/Pause/Resume/Stop controls work correctly. Activity saved on stop with Telugu success toast.

mocked_apis.gps_tracking: GPS errors expected in test environment (no real GPS)
mocked_apis.heart_rate: Simulated heart rate based on activity type and duration
